name: A Day at the Beach
instructions: Shake rum, amaretto, and orange juice in a shaker filled with ice. Strain into a highball glass over ice. Add grenadine and garnish with a pineapple wedge and a strawberry.

name: A Little Dinghy
instructions: Pour the shots into a glass of ice, and fill the glass with equal parts orange juice, cranberry juice, and pineapple juice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge, an orange slice, and an umbrella.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: A Night In Old Mandalay
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the light rum, anejo rum, orange juice, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the ginger ale. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: A Sunny Delight
instructions: Using shot glasses or a cannery style mason jar, pour the vodka and the triple sec together. Squeeze the lemon lightly, and place it on the rim. Fill the glass with sunny delight, then add a shot of club soda.

name: Abilene
instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Acapulco Zombie
instructions: Pour the alcohol in first, then finish off the glass with the two juices. Also, remember, just a little Creme de Menthe, not too much!

name: Affair
instructions: Pour schnapps, orange juice, and cranberry juice over ice in a highball glass. Top with club soda and serve.

name: After Sex
instructions: Pour the vodka and creme over some ice cubes in a tall glass and fill up with juice. to make it beuty full make the top of the glass with a grenadine and sugar.

name: Akis Special
instructions: Pour over ice in highball glass. Fill with Sprite and stir.

name: Alabama Riot
instructions: Pour fruit punch and ice into a glass, add southern comfort, peppermint schnapps and vodka. Stir. Finish with lime juice.

name: Alamo Splash
instructions: Mix with cracked ice and strain into collins glass.

name: Alcoholic Sherbert Delight
instructions: Combine the ingredients, starting with the orange juice, in a highball glass. Serve.

name: Alebrije
instructions: First mix some orange juice and pinapple juice in equal parts, and color it with some grenadine (as sweet as you want). This is "conga mix". Fill the glass with ice, add the five licours and mix them, fill the glass with some conga mix and enjoy.

name: Algae
instructions: Shake all ingredients over ice and pour into highball glass. No garnish.

name: Alien Urine
instructions: This drink is ideally made in a 16 ounce glass, but can also be made in a Collins glass. The drink is served on the rocks. Add the Midori, Malibo, and Schnaps. Add juices. Shake in a tin. Garnish with either two cherries or with a kiwi wheel.

name: Alien Urine Sample
instructions: Hand shake or blend with ice the Liqueur with the Sweet + Sour. Strain this mixture from the ice into a pounder glass with the Schnapps, Malibu, Creme de banane and soda. Float the Blue Curacao before serving.

name: Almost Heaven
instructions: Build in a collins glass over ice.

name: An Arif
instructions: Combine everything together in order it is listed, you may add Kool-Aid mix if desired, but make sure to add the lemon juice last. It is called an Arif because it will tend to block your nuts from getting off if you have too many of these.

name: Atlantic Sun
instructions: Shake all the ingredients, top the drink with soda. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Atlas
instructions: Mix in shaker with ice. Strain and serve.

name: Attitude
instructions: Stir. Garnish with a lemon & lime slice.

name: Aztec Surfboard
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass.

name: Baby V.O.X.
instructions: Mix over ice and serve in a highball glass.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Bacchanalian Cocktail
instructions: Shake all the ingredients (except lemonade) and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add the lemonade, and serve with seedless grapes.

name: Bad Attitude
instructions: Shake all ingredients together with equal parts of each juice and pour into a tall glass.

name: Bahama Mama Sunrise
instructions: Serve over ice in a tall glass.

name: Bahama Todd
instructions: Add light rum, dark rum, spiced rum, and malibu rum to an ice-filled glass. Mix in pineapple juice and blue curacao. Float 151 rum on top, and serve.

name: Bahia Breeze
instructions: Build, in order, in a highball glass over ice. Garnish with a wedge of lime, and serve.

name: Bakunin
instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker, and shake well. Pour into a small highball glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Bald Pussy
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass and shake.

name: Bali Dream
instructions: Put all ingredients in shaker together with some ice-cubes. Shake well. Serve with piece of banana on top of the glass.

name: Bali Punch
instructions: Shake rums, juices and syrup and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add the orangeade, and serve with in-season fruit and straws.

name: Barn Door
instructions: Pour into a highball glass and fill with pineapple juice. Float the cranberry juice.

name: Baso
instructions: Add ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously, strain into a highball glass, garnish with lime, and serve.

name: Bay Breeze
instructions: First, add cubed ice, then add the three parts stoli, then add the pineapple juice and last but not least, add the cranberry juice for color.

name: Beach Bum
instructions: Pour into a glass with ice. Stir.

name: Beach Sunday
instructions: Pour vodka and raspberry liqueur over ice. Add cranberry juice, and the freshly squeezed lime juice. Stir and serve.

name: Bent Bum
instructions: Fill Collins Glass with a heaping of ice. Pour in Vodka, Gin, 1/2 of remaining glass with O.J., then rest with Grapefruit. Skake, don't stir. Then add a healthy splah of Coca-cola.

name: Bermuda Rum Swizzle
instructions: Stir or shake vigorously until a frothing head appears. Strain into sour glasses. Garnish with a slice of orange or a Maraschino Cherry.

name: Bernardete
instructions: The Bernardete is very sweet, lots of fun and yet very easy to mix. Just put 3-4 ice cubes in a tall glass and cover with the Peach Liqueur. Then fill up the glass to the top with Peach Juice. Both ingredients should have been in the fridge before serving.

name: Berry Buster
instructions:
Combine all ingredients in a shaker and shake vigorously for 20 sec. Strain and serve with one fresh ice cube.

A mighty tasty drink that goes down smooth. If it's too sweet, try more vodka. If you really want to wow someone, double the recipe, add one egg white and shake for 15 sec instead of 20 sec.

name: Big Bad Voodoo Kooler
instructions: Sling Malibu, RedRum and Midori in a highball glass filled with ice. Top off with Orange, pineapple juices and a splash of soda. Mix it up with your swizzle stick and Go Daddy-O!

name: Big Dumb Russian
instructions: Fill the glass with ice. I like to use a standard beer glass. Add about 2 shots of vodka. Then fill the glass about 3/4th of the way with Sprite. Then add just a splash of pineapple juice. Finally, add the Blue Maui until you get a faint (almost skyblue) blue color. Stir.

name: Bigger Better Blue Lagoon
instructions: Pour over ice in glass. Shake or stir, add cherry and if you would like an additional splash of color, add a few drops of cherry grenadine.

name: Bingo
instructions: Build in highball glass with lots of ice. Garnish with slice of orange and cocktail cherry.

name: Black Orgasm
instructions: Just pour, stir, and enjoy.

name: Bleeding Surgeon
instructions: Pour Shot of Rum over slice of orange. Fill the remaining space in glass half way full of surge or similar drink. Finish off glass with cranberry juice. Be carefull, warm surge may foam over the glass.

name: Blindside
instructions: Pour strawberry syrup, orange juice, and grapefruit juice into a large glass. Add vodka, and serve.

name: Bloated Bag of Monkey Spunk
instructions: Shake and strain into collins glass with ice. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Blonde Ron
instructions: Just fill ice, then pour rum, 7up, and slash of pineapple.

name: Bloody Coochie
instructions:
Fill a glass half full of ice.

Pour in the ingredients in order. Stir or shake. Serve.

name: Bloody Passion
instructions: Build in a highball glass.

name: Bloody Smurf
instructions: Pour schnapps into glass filled with ice. Add cranberry juice and stir.

name: Blue Dog
instructions: Combine both while cold.

name: Blue Hawaiian Screw
instructions: Pour vodka and blue curacao into a large rocks or old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Fill with pineapple juice, and serve.

name: Blue Hawaiian Screw #2
instructions: Pour vodka and blue curacao into a large rocks or old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Fill with equal parts pineapple juice and orange juice. Garnish with an orange slice or a pineapple wedge, and serve.

name: Blue Heaven
instructions: Pour the blue curacao in the glass. Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake amaretto, rum, and pineapple juice. Pour it in the glass and stir. Garnish with pineapple slice.

name: Blue Light Special
instructions: Shake.

name: Blue Monkey
instructions: Pour in hurricane glass with crushed ice. Stir or mix gently.

name: Blue Whale
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and mix in a shaker. Strain into a tall glass, and serve.

name: Blue-Woo
instructions: Pour 1/2 oz. vodka and a 1/2 oz. blueberry schnapps in a tall glass. Balance with cranberry juice.

name: Boardwalk Breeze
instructions: Shake and strain ingredients into a hurricane glass.

name: Boca Chica
instructions: Shake and strain. Serve with a cherry or orange slice.

name: Bolduc On The Beach
instructions: Mix in glass. Serve on the rocks (optional).

name: Bondages' No Problem
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing cup, cover cup with a lid and shake. Pour over ice and enjoy.

name: Booda's Black Brew
instructions: Hurricane Glass Fill with Ice 1oz. Malibu Rum or Parrots Bay Coocnut Rum 3/4oz. Blue Curacao 3/4oz. Chambord 1/2oz. Grenadine Fill with Cranberry Top and Shake

name: Bootzilla
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add liquors. Fill with Pineapple juice. Shake. Garnish with Orange slice. Serve.

name: Boozy Maria
instructions: Mix and serve.

name: Bora Bora
instructions: Prepare in a blender or shaker, serve in a highball glass on the rocks. Garnish with 1 slice of pineapple and one cherry.

name: Bot Cocktail
instructions:
The easy way to make this drink is to add all listed ingredients with ice into shaker and strain into glass. 

However, the really slick way is much more impressive: 

Add cranberry juice, lime juice, triple sec and only one ounce vodka into shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Then, mix 1 once orange juice with one ounce vodka in a seperate glass. 

Fill a turkey baister with the vodka/OJ mix, and slowly inject it into the cranberry glass on the bottom. 

This produces a sort of reverse-layering effect, and also ensures both cranberry and OJ will have the same amount of vodka.

name: Brain Blender
instructions: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice and serve in a wine goblet with fruit and straws.

name: Brain Candy
instructions: Shake alcohols and juices. Add to glass with ice. Pour grenadine and ginger ale on top. Garnish with cherry and orange wheel.

name: Brassy Blond
instructions: Shake well, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Brian Fabulous
instructions: Mix ingredients and serve over ice.

name: Burning Sun
instructions: Pour over ice in highball glass, stir. Garnish with a fresh strawberry.

name: Burnso Tropical
instructions: Fill high ball glass with ice cubes. Add one ounce each of vodka and peach schnapps. Then add 3 oz of pineapple juice and 1 oz of cranberry juice. Shake and serve.

name: Burnt Embers
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bury Me Deep
instructions: Shake all but lemonade in a shaker and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add the lemonade.

name: Buttock Clencher
instructions: Shake all but the lemonade and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Add the lemonade and garnish with a cherry and pineapple chunk on stick.

name: Buzz Lightyear
instructions: Pour over cracked ice filled in glass and stir briefly.

name: Buzzby
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass with ice, and stir. Add a slice of lime if desired, and serve.

name: By The Pool
instructions: Shake briskley for 10 seconds and serve in a tall glass over ice.

name: Bye Bye Bahamas
instructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Add rum and punch. Stir. Float banana liqueur. Garnish with pineapple, orange slice and maraschino cherry.

name: Cactus Bowl
instructions:
Blend all ingredients with ice. Serve in margarita glass on rocks.

*Can substitute Jose Cuervo's Margarita Mix in place of the Lime Juice

name: Californian Hurricane
instructions: Mix all ingredients (alcohol first) together in a punch bowl or pitcher, and add only enough grenadine to turn it red. Add ice and serve in a highball glass.

name: Camen Miranda
instructions:
Squeeze lime wedge over ice. Pour in rum, fruit juice, and coca-cola. Stir lightly. Add club soda or tonic to taste.

*Fruit Juice should be pineapple, orange or banana.

name: Camp Grenada
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Add the 7-up, garnish with fruit, and serve.

name: Campbell F. Craig
instructions: Pour the tequila, orange juice, and pineapple juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the Chambord into the center of the drink.

name: Camshaft
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice, and serve.

name: Canada Dream
instructions: Shake all liquid ingredients with ice and strain over ice cubes. Serve with straw.

name: Canario
instructions: Dissolve sugar, shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a twist of lime, and serve.

name: Cape Of Good Will
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Captains Pie
instructions: Pour the ginger ale and cranapple juice together into a glass. Add the rum, and serve.

name: Caribbean
instructions: Fill a glass with crushed ice, add rum and triple sec. Add juice and stir.

name: Caribbean Bliss
instructions: Use chilled orange juice, but no ice.

name: Caribbean Breeze
instructions: Pour ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice. Stir and serve!

name: Caribbean Cruise
instructions: Combine all ingredients, shake well and serve over ice. Garnish with a lime wedge and a cherry (and an umbrella if handy).

name: Caribbean Dream
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass. Stir, add ice and serve.

name: Caribbean Harvest
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Caribbean Pineapple
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Caribbean Queen
instructions: Fill glass with handful of ice and add ingredients. Then mix.

name: Caribbean Smoked Torch
instructions: Mix all the ingredients, except for the 151 rum in a tin glass or shaker. Steam the snifter, using the 1/2 oz. of 151 lighting it, until it consumes itself. After that pour the content of the shaker in the hot snifter. It will create a really good smelling cloud of smoke, that is what distinguishes this cocktail.

name: Caribbean Sunset
instructions: Combine melon liqueur and malibu rum together in a hurricane glass. Slowly pour cranberry juice on top until it fills half the remaining space. Float orange juice on top, and serve.

name: Caribou Lou
description: Referenced in the song "Caribou Lou" by rapper Tech N9ne where he sings about it - "...151 rum, pineapple juice, and malibu, caribou, get them all numb...". The directions are included in the song also but are scaled to a unknown jug quantity. Therefore mix as you please but remember it's the 151 that will hit you. Originated in Kansas City, MO.Shake or serve up with ice in a highball glass.
instructions: Shake or serve up with ice in a highball glass.

name: Carla
instructions: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice and pour into a wine glass. Add lemonade, and garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Carnegie Sunrise
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Strain into a collins glass, and serve.

name: Cazuela
instructions: In a cazuela that is made of clay, put ice, salt, lime, orange, lemon, and grapefruit. Add grenadine, tequila, and fill with squirt. Use a straws to shake, and serve.

name: Charlie's Angel
instructions: Pour ingredients (except soda) into the beaker of a cocktail shaker. Mix gently, and pour into a glass half-filled with ice. Squeeze and drop one fresh lime wedge into the glass. Top with soda, and serve with a stirrer and a straw.

name: Chicago View
instructions: Shake with ice and serve over ice.

name: Chicks Dig It
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled glass and shake, or serve up in a cocktail glass.

name: Chilly Willy
instructions: Pour into shaker. Fill with orange and pineapple juice. Shake well.

name: China Village Mai Tai
instructions:
In a metal shaker add a fair amount of ice cubes. Add dark rum and light rum, then grenadine, orange juice, and pineapple juice. Finally add triple sec and shake vigorously.

Pour in a thick tall ribbed glass. Top with a cherry or a dash of triple sec.

name: Coco Cabana
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into ice filled highball glass. Garnish with a cherry and a pineapple piece.

name: Coco Rush
instructions: Add OJ, Cranberry juice, and Malibu into a mixing glass and pour into the highball glass.

name: Coctel Algeria
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel, and serve.

name: Colonial Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.

name: Colonial Rummer
instructions: Add crushed ice halfway up the glass. Add liquor ingredients. Stir with swizzle stick. Garnish with fruit. Relax and sip.

name: Columbus Cocktail
instructions: Shake briefly with a glassful of crushed ice, and strain into a double-cocktail glass. Add a slice of lime and serve.

name: Coo Coo
instructions: In a blender, combine ingredients with ice and enjoy!

name: Coppertone Punch
instructions: Combine Creme de Banana, Malibu Rum, Pineapple Juice & ice in mixing tin. Shake or flash blend. Strain over ice and float Midori. Garnish with watermelon wedge.

name: Cornholio's Revenge
instructions: Pour the malibu rum, banana liqueur, and cherry brandy. Add the ice and sprite. Add lime wedge and serve.

name: Cornwall-Nash
instructions: Pour the rum, gin, triple sec, and grapefruit juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the cherry brandy into the center of the drink. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Corsican
instructions: Pour into a highball glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lime. Serve with a straw.

name: Cowboy Roy
instructions: Pour vodka, rum and orange juice into a very tall glass, stir, and serve.

name: Cracklin' Rosie
instructions: Shake ingredients and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry on a stick, and serve.

name: Cran-Collins
instructions: Put three cubes of ice in a glass. Pour in Vodka, Cranberry Juice, and Collins Mix. Stir and enjoy.

name: Cran-Ram
instructions: Combine rum and cranberry juice first. Add a splash of sunny delight. May drink with crushed ice, if preferred.

name: Cran-Razz
instructions: Place ice cubes in glass. Add cranberry juice, then orange vodka.

name: Cranberry Newt
instructions: Shake vigourously. Serve.

name: Cranberry Toad
instructions: Shake vigourously. Serve.

name: Crazy Janie
instructions: Pour orange vodka into a deep stemmed glass with ice. Fill with grapefruit juice, add sprite or champagne, and stir gently. Spin the glass and drizzle in a few drops of grenadine to make a spiral effect. Garnish with a slice of lemon on the rim of the glass.

name: Crazy Monkey
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender or Island Oasis machine. Blend and serve in a hurricane glass. Top with whip cream and garnish with a strawberry and orange.

name: Croc Punch
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add liquors, fill nearly with sprite and top off with lime juice.

name: Crocodile
instructions: Pour midori and bacardi over a few ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill the rest of the way with the soda, and give a brisk stir.

name: Cuban Crime of Passion
instructions: Pour all the ingredients into a mixer glass, shake violently, and then pour the mixture into a 12 oz. glass with ice.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Cuban Special
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cucci
instructions: Add ice to glass, drizzle Southern Comfort over the ice. Add lemonade, orange juice and a dash of Cointreau and mix.

name: Cyber Smoke
instructions: Blend all ingredients and pour into champagne flute. Add a small piece of edible dry ice.

name: Cyberlady
instructions: Shake well and pour in a cocktail glass, frosted with strawberry.

name: Daredevil
instructions: Pour ingredients as listed into a Collins glass filled with ice.

name: Dark Fuzzy Navel
instructions: Pour ingredients as listed above into a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a Cherry.

name: Death of a Virgin
instructions: Pour vodka, schnapps and lime juice into a glass. Add orange juice until the glass is half-filled, and fill completely with 7-up. Stir well, and serve.

name: Dick in the Dirt
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a tall glass on the rocks.

name: Dirty Dog
instructions: Put ingredients into a mixing cup or blender, shake, then pour into a mason jar. Enjoy!

name: Dit Kicker
instructions: Pour the fruit punch into a glass. Add the vodka and schnapps. The correct amount of lemon juice all depends on personal preference. A couple of splashes is a good mix to start with.

name: Diva
instructions: Pour and build in a tall glass or collins glass. Fill with 7-up. Garnish with cherry and lime.

name: Downshift
instructions: Start with the sprite. Next comes the tequila. After that, add the Minute Maid fruit punch, then float the 151 proof rum. Rocks optional.

name: Duck Soup
instructions: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice.

name: Dungeon Punch
instructions: Mix fruit punch flavored kool-aid with schnapps, vodka, and orange juice. Once stirred, garnish with cherries.

name: Dutch Turbo
instructions: Mix on the rocks. Pour it all over cubed ice. Put a wedge pineapple on the glass. Serve it the way they want it.

name: Eagle Eye
instructions: Shake and serve in a highball glass with ice. Garnish with a slice of lime on the rim of the glass.

name: Earls Court
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemonade) and strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with broken ice. Add lemonade, and garnish with a cherry and an orange slice. Serve with short straws.

name: East India Cocktail #1
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: East West Cocktail
instructions: Shake and strain over two ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Easy Money
instructions: Blend all ingredients (except grenadine) briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Sprinkle grenadine on top, garnish with fruit, and serve.

name: Eden Cocktail
instructions: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Add a short straw, and serve.

name: EDO Cocktail
instructions: Blend with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of melon and a green cocktail cherry.

name: Egril
instructions: Cut a lime into eight seperate segments and place into an old-fashioned glass. Add sugar and crush until the juice is released. Add remaining ingredients, ensure sugar has dissolved, and fill with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry. Add a short straw, and serve.

name: El Nino
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake vigorously. Strain over ice in a hurricane glass, and garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

name: Electric Koolaid
instructions: Pour ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice.

name: Electric Smurf
instructions: Put three ice cubes in a glass then add Malibu and Blue Curacao. Fill glass half with Sprite half with Pineapple Juice. Stir and Serve.

name: Electric Watermelon
instructions: Add equal parts vodka, rum, and melon liqueur in a tall cocktail glass with ice. Add a couple of splashes of triple sec (orange liquor). Fill to the top with sweet and sour mix. Add a splash of 7-up and grenadine.

name: Emerald City
instructions: Pour into an ice filled hurricane glass.

name: Emerald Star
instructions: Shake ingredients, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Eroticolada
instructions: Blend ingredients with crushed ice, pour into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Ershammar Dream
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice, and shake.

name: Evergreen
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Exotic Finn
instructions:
Fill a highball glass with cracked ice. Add the first three ingredients and stir. Top up with sprite and garnish with mint leaves, a strawberry, a twist of orange and a straw. 

Ole Skeiedal, from Norway, took first place in the long drinks listing of the 1993 Finlandia Vodka International Drinks Competition.

name: Exotic Summernight
instructions: Mix vodka and juices, pour over ice in a glass, and layer a little grenadine on top. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Exploding Cherry
instructions: Pour it all into an ice-cream pail and add more vodka if you wish.

name: Extra Fuzzy Navel
instructions: Mix Peach Brandy, Peach Schnapps, and Triple Sec in a highball glass. Fill with Orange Juice and Ice to taste.

name: Eye of the Tiger
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except dark rum) and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Sprinkle dark rum on top, and garnish with an orange slice. Serve with straws.

name: Eyes Wide Shut
instructions: Place ice in shaker and add all ingredients. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

name: Fat Hooker
instructions: Pour first three ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange or pineapple juice, stir well, and serve.

name: Fat Sailor
instructions: Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker. Strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice, and serve.

name: Feel This
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Next add absolut, sloe gin, pineapple juice, southern comfort, and last midori. Add pineapple and cherry garnish.

name: Finnish Passion
instructions: Shake all ingredients, pour into a longdrink glass. Garnish with a boat of orange and red cherry.

name: Firebird
instructions: Pour into an old-fashioned glass three-quarters filled with broken ice, and serve.

name: Fishbone
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add liquor, orange juice, and sour mix. Shake well. Add 7-up and serve.

name: Five Dollar Shake
instructions: Pour all ingredients into pint glass. Drink.

name: Flamingo Punch
instructions: Build into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a lemon wheel.

name: Florida Rum Runner
instructions: Mix in blender until ice is crushed into slushy form. Serve while frozen.

name: Flower Of Nippon
instructions: Blend with ice and strained in to the cocktail glass and garnish with a slice of lime and red cherry.

name: Flyin' Hawaiian
instructions: Pour midori, rum, and pineapple juice into shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into glass over ice. Pour in sprite and stir lightly.

name: Flying Masturbator
instructions: Pour the vodka and amaretto into the cup first. Add OJ until the cup is about half full, add cranberry juice until the glass is about 3/4 full, add ice to fill the cup, and shake the drink vigorously for a few seconds. Enjoy.

name: Fong Juice
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add malibu, then add pineapple juice. Stir.

name: Forbidden Smoke
instructions: Blend all ingredients and pour into a cocktail glass. Add a piece of edible dry ice.

name: Forest Funk
instructions: Moisten the rim of the collins glass with a lime wedge and coat the rim with granulated sugar. Ice the glass and build the vodka and peach schnapps. Top with grapefruit juice.

name: Formula 1
instructions: Pour ingredients into a collins glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lime, a sprig of mint, and serve.

ingredients.name: Marie Brizard® Creme de Fraise des Bois

name: French Whore
instructions: Shake vigorously over ice and strain into a rocks glass.

name: Frooty Biznitch
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry, and serve.

name: Frozen Berkeley
instructions: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Frozen Matador
instructions: Blend all ingredients (except pineapple stick) with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, add the pineapple stick, and serve.

name: Frozen Melon Ball
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a speared melon ball and lime slice, and serve with a short straw.

name: Frozen Passion Margarita
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender and blend. Strain into a margarita glass rimmed with coarse salt, garnish with a wheel of lime, and serve.

name: Fruit a La La

instructions: Whack the liquid ingredients in a glass and give it a stir, then add the ice.

name: The Finnely
instructions: Mix all ingredients, shake and pour over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a lemon, lime, and orange wedge.

name: The Fuzzy Magnum
instructions: Mix all ingredients (except lemon wedge) into shaker. Fill glass with ice and pour until about 1/4 inch remains in glass. Squeeze lemon wedge into drink then drop lemon wedge in (for color and flavor).

name: The Fuzzy Pissbomb
instructions: Pour all ingredients in rocks glass. (with silver polka dots on it if possible) Stir. Watch it fizz for thirty seconds. Drink it fast.

name: The Game
instructions: Pour light rum into an ice-filled highball glass. Add cranberry juice, top with triple sec, and serve.

name: The Green Mile
instructions: Shake and serve in a cocktail glass.

name: The Green One
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, and pour into a glass.

name: The Green Wave
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Chill and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Serve immediately.

name: The Head
instructions: Place ice in a glass upto the rim. Add alcohol followed by cranberry juice, stir and serve.

name: The Head
instructions: Pour rum and peach schnapps into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with cranberry juice, stir and serve.

name: The Jolly Rancher
instructions: Shake ingredients and serve in a highball glass over ice.

name: The Jolly Rancher
instructions: Pour vodka and melon liqueur into a cocktail shaker, and fill with cranberry juice. Shake, pour over ice in a highball glass, and serve.

name: The Leap Frog
instructions: Shake ingredients and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime and two maraschino cherries on both ends of the lime.

name: The Lunchbox
instructions: Chill and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: The Naked Lady
instructions: Mix in a tall glass and serve over ice.

name: The Naked Lady
instructions: Mix in a tall glass and serve over ice.

name: The Nog
instructions: Pour midori, triple sec and rum into a 12-ounce highball glass filled with ice. Fill with pineapple juice, stir, and serve.

name: The Race
instructions: Pour into a shaker and shake well. Serve in a cocktail glass frosted with tangerine.

name: The Sabino Special
instructions: Pour the Midori, Malibu, Schnapps, and orange juice into a shaker filled halfway with ice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass and add the grenadine. Garnish with orange wedges and cherries as seen fit.

name: The Shiwala
instructions: Shake well with ice and pour into Hurricane glass. Add a floater of Myer's dark rum for an additional kick.

name: The Wedge
instructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Stir.

name: This-n-That
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a tall glass, stir, and serve.

name: Three Day Weekend
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with plenty of ice. Add Jí¤germeister and rum first. Top off with pineapple juice and grenadine. Shake well.

name: Thug Heaven
instructions: Fill cocktail glass with ice and mix the two ingredients.

name: Thug Passion
description: This drink is referenced in the song "Thug Passion" by rapper 2Pac in which the ingredients are "alize and cristal". Cristal is the brand name of a well-known Champagne produced by Louis Roederer, Since we don't expect everyone to have $350 for a bottle, we listed generic Champagne.Shake ingredients over ice and serve.
instructions: Shake ingredients over ice and serve.

name: Tidal Wave
instructions: Pour gin, vodka, rum and peach schnapps over ice in a collins glass. Add orange and pineapple juices, a dash of grenadine, and float 151 rum on top. Garnish with a piece of fresh cut pineapple. The wave will sweep you away!

name: Tie Me To The Bedpost
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Tie Me To The Bedpost - Hawaiian
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into an over-sized martini glass. There should be a slight amount of foam from the 7-up.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Tie Me To The Bedpost Baby
instructions: Mix with ice in a hurricane glass.

name: Tiffany's Wet and Ready
instructions: Fill Mason jar with crushed ice. Add pineapple juice and Malibu rum. Mix well. Add splash of grenadine and 151 proof rum. Garnish with cherry, pineapple, or other fruit slice.

name: Tiger Woods
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, add the vodka, lemon juice and cran. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

name: Tijuana Taxi
instructions: Pour tequila, curacao, and schnapps over ice into large highball glass. Fill with lemon-lime soda and garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

name: Time of the month
instructions: Mix the alcohol in a mixing glass with ice. Fill a clear glass 1/4 full with the mixture, add 2 parts orange juice, 1 part pineapple juice, and pour 2 count of grenadine to finish. DO NOT MIX ONCE GRENADINE IS ADDED!!! It should settle out on the bottom. Serve cold :-)

name: Tina Baker
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add 1 1/2 oz. of peach schnapps. Then fill the glass about 1/2 full with Orange Juice. Next fill the rest of the glass with 7-Up or Sprite. Top the drink off with a dash of grenadine. Garnish with a flag.

name: Tipsy Island
instructions: Crush ice in a blender. Add frozen strawberries and banana to blender. Put on low speed and add Malibu & Banana liqueur. Pour into tall glass.

name: Tom's Rum Runner
instructions: Pour all liquids except dark rum into glass. Fill with ice and stir. Float dark rum on top and stir gently.

name: Tonight's the Night
instructions: Shake with a glassful of broken ice and pour unstrained into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Tootsy Pop
instructions: Pour orange juice in first, then the peach schnapps. Then pour the shot of midori down the side of the glass, so that the midori forms a layer at the bottom of the glass.

name: Toxic Antifreeze
instructions: Fill a 12 ounce glass with ice, add 1 ounce of vodka, 1 ounce of triple sec and 1 ounce of midori, fill with yellow lemonade and enjoy.

name: Tree Frog
instructions: Mix vodka, Maui, and grapefruit juice together, then pour over highball glass with ice.

name: Tree House
instructions: Pour into an ice-filled pina colada glass. Garnish with a mint sprig and a cherry, add straws, and serve.

name: Tree Shaker
instructions: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Add short straws, and serve.

name: Triple Sec Sunrise
instructions:
First fill glass 3/4 full with Orange Juice. Next add 1/4 Triple Sec. Finaly add Grenadine and mix thoroughly! 

Garnish with a slice of Orange.

*If too weak add more Triple Sec.

name: Tropic Heat
instructions: Mix over ice and shake. Pour into a glass, garnish with fruit.

name: Tropical Binalada
instructions: Combine first 5 ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour the contents unstrained into a collins glass and top up with club soda.

name: Tropical Dawn
instructions: Shake and strain gin and orange juice into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Sprinkle campari bitters on top, add a short straw, and serve.

name: Tropical Dream
instructions: Shake the three ingredients together and poor in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a red cherry on the rim of the glass.

name: Tropical Heat
instructions: Mix with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a orange spiral.

name: Tropical Itching
instructions: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange, a cherry and a sprig of mint.

name: Tropical Kermit Piss
instructions: Just pour into a glass and add the softdrink and ice.

name: Tropical Lust
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add gin and vodka. Almost fill with pineapple juice, then add southern comfort and melon liqueur. The drink can also be made frozen by adding 1 1/2 scoops of ice and blending.

name: Tropical Nat
instructions: Pour rum and vodka over ice, and add juices one by one, letting the juices swirl together, rather than mix. Garnish with a slice of lime, orange, or pineapple.

name: Tropical Orgasm #3
instructions: Mix all ingredients in shaker. Pour over ice. Garnish with cherry.

name: Tropical Storm Jack
instructions: Put all in hi-ball glass and shake garnish w/lime.

name: Tropical Sunrise
instructions: Half fill glass with crushed ice. Add rum, triple sec, orange juice, and pineapple juice. Stir. Add Grenadine and top with cherry and other fruit.

name: Tropical Teaser
instructions: Place in a cold shaker with ice. Shake for one minute and serve over ice.

name: Tropical Titty Twister
instructions: Mix in glass then shake.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Tropical Waters
instructions: Pour the Melon liqueur and the Blue curacao into a highball glass. Then add Sprite, and finally the ice cubes.

name: Tropical Whiskey Punch
instructions: Muddle all ingredients except the whiskey in a bar glass. Add whiskey, shake with ice, and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a pineapple and lemon wedge, a cherry, and serve.

name: Troutie
instructions: Pour the vodka first, add grapefruit juice, and fill with about 6 ounces of 7-up or Sprite.

name: Tsunami
instructions: Fill glass with ice, add Capt. Morgan and malibu. Fill with the pineapple juice. Float 1/2 oz of grenadine and then add 1/2 oz of a dark rum (meyers) for color. Found this to a very popular drink at my bar.

name: Tsunami #2
instructions: Place kiwi slice in the bottom of the glass. Add alcohols. Fill with mountain dew.

name: Twister
instructions: Pour vodka and juice of lime into a collins glass over several ice cubes. Fill with lemon-lime soda, stir, and serve.

name: Vaitkus
instructions: Shake ingredients, pour into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Valentine
instructions: Shake banana liqueur, vodka, and cranberry juice with ice cubes and strain into a red wine glass.

name: Vampire Juice
instructions: Pour coconut rum, curacao and bacardi into a shaker with three or four ice cubes. Strain into a collins glass, fill with orange juice, and serve.

name: Venus Rum
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except soda water) and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Add soda, add straws, garnish with a slice of starfruit, and serve.

name: Verboten
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with a cherry, and serve.

name: Vicious Kiss
instructions: Pour into a cordial glass, stir gently, and serve.

name: Vodka Sunrise
instructions: Mix vodka and orange juice in a highball glass. Top with grenadine, and serve.

name: Voodoo Sunrise
instructions: Pour rum and vodka into a collins glass. Tilt the glass, and pour the grenadine down the inside. Fill with chilled orange juice, and serve.

name: Waikiki Beachcomber
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Waste of Time Cocktail
instructions: Shake, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Watercolour
instructions: Mix liquors together and add pineapple juice to taste. Garnish with a cherry or a pineapple chunk.

name: Watermelon Pucker Fucker
instructions: Mix in a hurricane glass.

name: Wave Runner
instructions: Pour rum and cranberry juice into a tall glass. Slowly add sprite, stopping immediately when the color changes from red to pink.

name: Weekend On The Beach
instructions: Mix the crown royal, apple and peach schnapps, and sweet and sour mix with ice cubes in a shaker and shake until well blended. Strain into a shot glass. Makes one serving.

name: West Indian Punch
instructions: Shake over crushed ice in a shaker, and strain into a collins glass. Fill with crushed ice, sprinkle with nutmeg, and serve.

name: Wet and Wild Lip Tickler
instructions: Pour ingredients as listed into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with an orange wedge, and serve.

name: Wet Dream
instructions: Mix all ingredients except chambord. Chill and strain mixture into a martini glass. Float chambord to the bottom of the glass.

name: Whippet
instructions: Made as in a normal vodka and orange, with raspberry cordial added last.

name: Wicked Willy
instructions: Pour into a frosted wine glass, and serve.

name: Wild Island
instructions: Shake and strain into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Garnish with an orange wedge and serve.

name: Wild Sex
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice, pour in malibu, peach schnapps and 151. Pour juices on top followed by a splash of grenadine. Use a shaker tin to cover the glass and give a couple of good shakes.

name: Wild Squirrel Sex
instructions: Fill a 16 oz. cup with ice. Add shots and almost-fill with equal parts of sour mix and cranberry juice. Top with a splash of grenadine, and serve.

name: Wild Thing
instructions: Pour over ice into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Wild Wendy
instructions: Pour each ingredient into a shaker. Shake well. Serve in a highball glass over ice.

ingredients.name: Captain Morgan® Parrot Bay coconut rum

name: Wile E Coyote
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a tall glass.

name: Windjammer
instructions: Stir first three ingredients together and pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Top with a maraschino cherry.

name: Winter Parker
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice cubes, shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Wonder Woman
instructions: Carefully layer ingredients, in order, into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Serve unstirred, garnished with a cherry.

name: Woo Woo
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve.

name: Wrightsville Sunset
instructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake, and strain into a large white wine glass half-filled with crushed ice.

name: Wu Wu
instructions: Pour vodka over ice in a highball glass. Add equal parts of orange and cranberry juice, and serve.

name: Yellow Birdie
instructions:
Pour Vodka into glass over ice followed by Creme de Banana, then top it up with Sprite & stir.

*Can substitute Light Rum for Vodka.

name: Yellow Boxer
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Yellow Fever
instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Serve.

name: Yellow Parakeet
instructions: Fill glass with ice and build drink top with splash of sour.

name: Yoda
instructions:
Mix the Sour Mix and Blue Curacao together in a shaker, or if you don't have a shaker, two identical glasses will work if you are careful. 

Use more or less Blue Curacao depending on how green your Sour Mix was to begin with. Once those are mixed into a nice green color, add the Midori and then the Pucker. Finally add the splash of Vodka, and mix a couple more times, then pour over ice.

name: Yum-Yum
instructions: Shake and strain into a double-cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of lime, and serve.

name: Yummy Bidnis
instructions: Combine ingredients in highball glass and stir.

name: Zadarade
instructions: Fill glass with ice cubes. Add absolut mandrin, triple sec, and sour mix. Add a splash of cranberry juice, and pineapple. Shake, and top with a splash of lemon-lime soda.

name: Zippy's Revenge
instructions: Mix Kool-Aid to taste then add Rum and Amaretto. Shake well to dissolve the sugar into the Kool-Aid. Serve cold.

name: Zombie #6
instructions: Mixed in a shaker on ice. Serve in a tumbler on crushed ice.
